projects.title: Project 01
projects.subtitle: Living / Kitchen
projects.description: A calm, light-filled living space with warm wood and tactile neutrals. The layout stays open for flow, with clean lines and soft volumes.

projects.title: Project 02
projects.subtitle: Residential
projects.description: A residential concept built around simplicity and proportion. Materials stay honest and restrained, letting texture do the work.

facts.label: Palette
facts.value: Soft whites, warm timber, matte finishes

projects.title: Project 03
projects.subtitle: Kitchen / Bar
projects.description: A kitchen and bar environment with a stronger, evening tone. Dark surfaces, warm highlights, and a confident material contrast.

facts.label: Palette
facts.value: Deep stone, warm bronze, soft light
